content: join the divine debris newsletter so you never miss a free pattern release 1 > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 2 **description ** simple gets thrown around as a negative a lot but in simplicity you can really find beauty with the claire basket you ve got simple stitches any crocheter would know but it s that simplicity that allows the combination of colors and textures to shine leaving room for customization if you d like to this basket is worked from the bottom up in rounds and comes together rather quickly it s a fun and easy weekend project that becomes not only home décor another lovely place to keep your next wip the sample for this basket was made with hue + me yarn from lion brand and this pattern is available in a kit 3 affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2023 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design
